subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers re-signed the free- agent forward Brendan Shanahan to a one-year contract to put in place another piece of a team they believe can be a leading contender for the Stanley Cup.
snippet: The Rangers re-signed the free- agent forward Brendan Shanahan to a one-year contract to put in place another piece of a team they believe can be a leading contender for the Stanley Cup.
